text: hey guys thanks for coming i'm so sorry
about your bubby rose we have this
episode where cyrus's bubby rose dies
and part of jewish culture is that they
would have a shiva which is where all
the close family comes together and
mourns together and grieves and tells
stories
the episode is such an important moment
for so many characters but i'm lucky
andy starts to really appreciate cece
i still have my puppy and also jonah and
cyrus have these beautiful moments
i think it's really important especially
for me as as a jew myself to
share my culture there's kids out there
who have never seen a shiva this is
sitting shiva
apparently it's a great way to celebrate
bubbe's life and show that death is not
just about sadness or mourning but it's
also about
happiness and reliving all the amazing
memories to bobby rose
may her memory be a blessing
[Music]
upside down
